Hey! I'm Sam Casey, a software developer and designer.

This site is where I display my best projects, designs, and blogs. If you want to view my projects, read my blogs, check out my resume, or get in touch, you're in the right place!

A little more about me...

At work:

I’m a creative problem solver with a passion for helping others take control of their lives financially, physically, and professionally. I love working in teams that challenge each other to grow daily.

In the past, I’ve worked in strategy, product and finance at large companies in the financial and tech sectors. I now spend my time building web-apps and helping entrepreneurs turn their vision into reality.

Outside of work:

I love hiking, fishing, running, reading, spending time with friends, and meditating. I grew up outside of Boston, MA and I’m a huge Celtics fan!
